content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "conduit", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 25, "index": 40}, {"type": "brain_coral", "quantity": 62, "index": 45}]
thought: I need to craft a redstone_lamp, and to do that I need to place redstone in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 25, "index": 40}, {"type": "brain_coral", "quantity": 62, "index": 45}]
thought: I need to place a second redstone in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 25, "index": 40}, {"type": "brain_coral", "quantity": 62, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to place a glowstone in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 25, "index": 40}, {"type": "brain_coral", "quantity": 62, "index": 45}]

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 25, "index": 40}, {"type": "brain_coral", "quantity": 62, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the redstone_lamp by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
